nodes.text: Patrol 118 was a patrol of B1-Series battle droids, B2 super battle droids, and droidekas that were stationed on Onderon under King Sanjay Rash in 20 BBY. Patrol 118 was attacked by a group of Onderon rebels under Saw Gerrera, and every unit was destroyed, including their OOM commander after it called for reinforcements. The rebels gained an AAT from this assault, which they used to blow up a power station.
